## AdjacencyMatrix.deformedLaplacian() method

Computes: `I - nA + n^2 * (D - I)`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deformedLaplacian(n: number, deg?: CSR): CSR;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> |  |
|  deg | <code>CSR</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`CSR`
